game_description: Exero Vet is the first affordable, full-service, veterinary medical virtual reality video resource for schools and practices. Exero Vet has partnered with some of the world’s top schools to bring you your go-to study tool; providing you with videos constructed by professionals that keep teaching in mind when creating videos. Learn the basics such as “Scalpel Blade Loading” and “Scalpel Blade Loading for Left-Handed Individuals”. Then, as you progress through school or find yourself in need of a refresher, explore more advanced videos such as, “Resection and Anastomosis” and “Equine Lag Screw Placement”. What started as an exclusively mobile VR experience is now available for those looking to get the full experience on Oculus.
